member.name: M:Microsoft.PowerShell.MarkdownRender.MarkdownConverter.Convert(System.String,Microsoft.PowerShell.MarkdownRender.MarkdownConversionType,Microsoft.PowerShell.MarkdownRender.PSMarkdownOptionInfo)
member.summary: Convert from Markdown string to VT100 encoded string or HTML. Returns MarkdownInfo object.
member.param: String with Markdown content to be converted.
Specifies type of conversion, either VT100 or HTML.
Specifies the rendering options for VT100 rendering.
member.returns: MarkdownInfo object with the converted output.
